title: Mr Boukadoum attends 2nd meeting of African Union support group for Mali
text: Foreign Minister, Mr Sabri Boukadoum, took part Monday, in Lome, in the second ministerial meeting of the African Union support group for Mali.
The principles contained in the action plan, recently adopted by Mali's transition authorities, were examined during this meeting.
The implementation of the peace and reconciliation agreement resulting from the Algiers process was also addressed by the meeting's participants.
In his speech, the Minister informed participants of the progress made by the Malian parties in this context and recalled Algeria's support for stability in this border country.
Participants unanimously welcomed the role of Algeria as leader of international mediation and Chairman of the Agreement Follow-up Committee (CSA) in Kidal.
